overview: Bruce Edward Spector is a technology action junkie. He has been creating and investing in innovation for over twenty years. As the founder of WebCal (acquired by Yahoo) he created the web’s first scalable personal information platform now Yahoo Calendar and PIM. He worked in senior management at Yahoo where his business card read “turbo yahoo”. Since then he has started an incubator, ATTAP (All Things to All People) Technologies, Inc which developed PersonalDNA.com, LifeIO.com, and BuzzVote.com.
